Notes.Text:
This update for netatalk fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-22995: Fixed a flaw where combining primitives offered by SMB and AFP in their default configuration may allow an attacker to achieve arbitrary code execution. (bsc#1197576)

Vulnerabilities.Description: The combination of primitives offered by SMB and AFP in their default configuration allows the arbitrary writing of files. By exploiting these combination of primitives, an attacker can execute arbitrary code.
